main_definition: An idiom used to emphasize the action done by oneself or refer back to oneself in a sentence.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Refers to one's own person or self, often used for emphasis
Used when referring back to the subject of a sentence to emphasize their personal involvement in an action
Indicates that someone is doing something independently without help from others
Used to express self-reliance and independence in various situations
meanings_and_examples.example: I can learn this myself if I try hard enough.
